features: Ergonomic versatility: Executive style, modern design, and powerhouse comfort in one. Click5 Lumbar Support, FlipAdjust Armrests, TiltRock, and Classic Colors—your choice, your comfort.
Click-5 Comfort: Adapt to your mood with 5-Stage Lumbar Support. Secure and soothing, every day just 'clicks better' with TiltRock for relaxation and TiltLock for focus.

Adaptable Comfort: FlipAdjust Armrests offer options—arms, no arms, or in-between. Purposeful, space-saving, with curved padded armrests for added comfort and strong construction for personalized leaning.
Sleek & Sturdy: PU Leather, Heavy Duty Nylon Wheelbase with reinforced structure. Class-4 Gas Lift, 18.7-22.4in range, max 240lbs. Colors: Black, Taupe, or White for a stylish touch.
Effortless Assembly: +Posture comes with tools, instructions, weighs 40.8lbs. Look right, feel right, move right—'Right Size Your Workspace.’

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Five Ways to Find Your Comfortable Every day's mood deserves its own perfect chair. Our Click5 Lumbar Support offers customizable comfort with adjustable levels for your lower back. Plus, our TiltRock feature lets you gently rock for reflection or stay firmly upright with TiltLock while you work. Your comfort, your choice, every day.

Experience the perfect fit for your workspace: Click5 Lumbar Support, Smooth Tilt, and FlipAdjust Armrests. With sleek PU Leather in 3 Classic Colors, step into a new era of Executive Chair design. It's everything you need, tailored for you.

Click-5 Lumbar Support Easily customize your comfort! Lift the built-in lumbar support to click between 5 positions on the chair's backrest. Foldable Armpads Adjustable padded armrests adapt to your sitting style, offering cushioned relief and customizable support for your arms and elbows. Smart Cushion Experience spacious comfort with up to 21.8” hip room, supported by open cell foam and sleek PU Leather. Sit back and relax. Heavy Duty Nylon Wheelbase The HD Nylon 5-Point Base combines elegance with strength, reinforced by structural ribs and gussets. Supports up to 240lbs with durability and style.

Smooth Hydraulics Experience seamless support with our 'Best in Class' Class4 Gas Lift. The +Posture seat adjusts from 19.8” to 23.6” for your perfect sitting position. 2:1 Synchro Reclining Discover your ideal posture with a tilt of up to 135 degrees. Easily lock it in place by pushing the handle inward for secure upright positioning. Easy to Assemble Assembly made easy! Includes tools and instructions for a hassle-free setup in just 30 minutes. Available in 3 Fashion Colors Choose from 3 Classic Colors to complement your décor perfectly.

Customize your comfort: choose between with or without armrests, or find a middle ground. Enjoy the convenience of a space-saving design, curved padded armrests for comfort, and sturdy construction for personalized leaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am so pleased I chose this chair! It was worth the price and is extremely comfortable! Whomever wrote the assembly directions did a very good job. It is very well made, sharp looking, and functional too. Made to last and relaxing on my body for hours of office work. It’s perfect for a person of small or medium size stature. I am really happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Still Excellent one year later!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this ergonomic chair for use with my dining table, as I spend a fair amount of time each day with my 75 year old body sitting in it. It arrived in fine condition, assembled quite easily, has great leather-like skin and just-right padding in all the right places.One year later, this chair - with all of the use it has gotten - is in exactly the same fine condition as when it arrived. That is to say: no signs of wear, no flattening of the padding and it remains as comfortable as ever! I really like the taupe color.Yes, it does look just a little weird with the three dining chairs, but at my age, I could care less. I double my dining table as a desk and the entertainment system is across from the table. My poor back really loves this chair! The adjustable ergonomic back support actually works.I thought a long time about adapting an ergonomic office chair to my dining set, and after a year's use of this particular chair, I have absolutely no regrets.I would not hesitate to buy this chair, or any other product from this manufacturer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a decent chair that can be hard to assemble due to the the finish of the assembly parts.
reviews.reviewText: I'm sitting in it right now. This chair is all about lumbar support. It's also stiff yet cushy enough. The height adjusts well. The tilt back feature is kind of useless unless you want to rock backwards for some reason -- mid-day stretch routine? Swivels left and right nice. Rolls around good. I bought this since I'm hybrid at the office, which works out to me going into the office twice a month. So, I needed a real office chair for home.Assembly: UGH! Even if you follow the instructions perfectly, it's hard enough. If you're someone who is used to assembling Amazon or IKEA-bought "you build it" furniture, you'll get this chair project done. But the metal castings inside the seat and back that the various screws go into vary in quality. For two screws that secure the arms to the chair and hold the seat and back of the chair to the arms' framework, it was really hard to thread two of the screws in with the included tool. I don't have a power tool screw driver with an allen wrench head, or a power screw driver at all, so i was working up quite the sweat getting the screws in.But at some point I learned that the included tool has two of the same-sized allen wrench ends, and the short end is so you can get more torque when you are putting the screws in. But still, I would say that there is something a little wrong with the machining of two of the holes because it took crazy force to get the screws all the way in.Also, it will be key to have someone hold the back steady as you attach it to the arm assembly that holds the chair together.Also, the reason the directions tell you to only 50 percent tighten the screws that go into the arm/seat/back assembly as you assemble is so you have some give to work with as you line up the subsequent screws into their holes through the arm assemblies and into the seat and back. When all the screws are in at 50 percent, then you can tighten them to 100 percent.Happy sitting!edit: After using this chair for three days, it's just about perfect. It would be perfect if the arm rests were adjustable two inches up or down. But, it's easy to flip them up and not use them at all.edit 2: After five months of use, still a great office chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, easy to assemble and super comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: Awesome chair for my back/hip pain: I'm a 5'7" 135 lb female. Fits my back and legs perfectly and looks soooo beautiful. I'm very happy with my purchase. My chair did not come with instructions, but if you have ever put together a child's bicycle (or most furniture), you can put together this chair by yourself. Took me about 15 minutes. Definitely a very blue/white color for those that need to know the color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing and Comfortable for a Short Chick!
reviews.reviewText: I have had a few office chairs in my day. But, being only 5'2", I never found one that really fit me...before now! Once it was assembled, I sat down and literally said, "ahhhh!" I can put my feet flat on the floor! The armrests fit under my desk! The lumbar support actually sits where it should on me! I have short legs, a short torso, short arms, basically the whole munchkin thing and this chair feels so nice!I tell you, it might be wrong to be this excited over office furniture, but I don't even care. I do think it may not work for you if you are over a certain weight/size. Check the seat width measurements to make sure it will fit you well. I'm an average weight and am very comfortable. If you have a long torso, the lumbar may not be in the right spot for you, so consider that as well.The color is nice, a very elegant-looking "greige" leaning more to the beige side. I think it looks really nice for the price point. The seat cushion is very comfortable so far, but I haven't spent hours and hours in it yet. If it becomes less comfortable over time, I will update the review.I didn't have much trouble assembling the chair, though I do think it would be faster and easier with two people. The hardest part was putting the back on, since if you are alone, you have to balance it carefully to line the screw holes up, and it is awkward. If you assemble it on your own, I suggest putting the two bottom screws in first to stabilize, then going back and adding the top ones on each side.Since I just got the chair, I can't speak yet on its durability long-term, but I'll update my review if it doesn't hold up. I plan to be proactive in caring for the bonded leather to protect it from peeling, so hopefully, I can enjoy the chair for a long time!

reviews.reviewTitle: Big, strong, comfy. A few heads ups.
reviews.reviewText: Really pleased with the chair. It has a nice high back, but don't go into it expecting head or neck support. Strong, supportive base, though I did buy wheels that are rubber and more high end separately. The seat isn't as wide as I had expected, so likely unsuitable for a heavy set or wide hipped person. The height lift can be locked into place, but the tilt cannot. It is not breathable, but you should already know that based on the material. Very easy to assemble, though heavy, so required a second set of hands at a certain point. The only issue I had is that a couple of the screw covers wouldn't fit into place, even with a bit of hammering- which is over all not a big deal. Easy to operate and comfy!
me gusto mucho. es una de las mejores en el mercado

reviews.reviewTitle: Armlehnen- Montage ohne Werkzeug/ Hilfsmittel nicht möglich
reviews.reviewText: Passung einer Armlehne ungenau. Ohne Schraubstock und Rundfeile wäre die Armlehne nicht montierbar gewesen

I find this chair very comfortable to sit in for long periods of time. It has great lumbar support. The chair was easy to assemble with very comprehensive instructions that were easy to follow. I would recommend this chair for anyone, but especially for anyone with back or shoulder problems.
Excelente calidad, muy cómoda y fácil de armar
